ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED( CMPL123_WF_Action__c ) && ( CMPL123_WF_Action__c =="Submit Final Review - Effectiveness Check Not Required"||CMPL123_WF_Action__c =="Verify Effectiveness - CAPA Action Plan") && ISPICKVAL( Effectiveness_Check_Required__c,"")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Effectiveness check Required? must be answered before proceeding further.
